DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial investigate immediate effect neuro-lymphatic treatment , thoracic vertebral costal articulatory term back pain level , cervical dorsal flexibility , sense body comfort satisfaction treatment receive .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Changes After Manual Therapy Patients With Non-specific Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects : The study conduct Faculty Physiotherapy University Valencia ( Spain ) . Persistent non-specific back pain subject 20 30 year old recruit voluntarily participate study . Excluded subject musculoskeletal injury spine balance disorder , recover injury locomotor neurological system , sequelae trauma suffer past six month could affect result study . Study design : The conduct study experimental , longitudinal prospective , control , randomize single-blind design ( subject therapists n't know objective treatment many treatment offer , evaluator unaware treatment apply ) . There 3 group : ) neuro-lymphatic treatment ; b ) vertebral articulatory treatment ; c ) proximal costal articulatory treatment .
DOC.criteria: Nonspecific Back Pain subject 20 30 year old recruit voluntarily participate study . Excluded subject musculoskeletal injury spine balance disorder Those recover injury locomotor neurological system , Those sequelae trauma suffer past six month could affect result study .
